translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか降りてきてはくれんやろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely it won't come down here, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だろうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I suppose not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからこっちが高い所まで行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why we'll have to go up somewhere high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「高い所、って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: High up, you say...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マリア、双眼鏡で奴の姿は見たな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, you saw its figure with the binoculars, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたいどのくらいの高さだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About how high up was it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……見たけど……ええと、倍率から……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I saw it... well, judging by the magnification...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待ってね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアは手近な紙にガリガリと式を書いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria scribbled formulas on the nearest paper,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計算し始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and began to calculate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例の衛星、前の物って大きさ分かる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know the size of that satellite, the previous one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メガラスから聞いたくらいだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard from Megalas about it... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええと、確か…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me see, if I recall correctly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実のところ、高さがいくらかは重要ではないがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truthfully, the exact height isn't very important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれだけ高くとも、世界一高い場所がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter how high it is, there is the highest place in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………翔竜山か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Mount Shoryu, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐえーーー！　あそこかぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gweh! That place, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ。俺がどんどん高い所に登ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exactly. If I keep climbing higher and higher,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴はどうなる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what will happen to that thing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふむ。自力であの高度を保っているとしたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... if it's maintaining that altitude by itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に高く距離を取る可能性もあるぞ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's a chance it might go even higher to keep the distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそ、翔竜山以上に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like, even above Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……たぶん無いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That... probably won't happen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「翔竜山より高い所は、壁があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Above Mount Shoryu, there is a wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛べるとしても、そこにぶつかるはずです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it can fly, it would hit that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天の壁を貫くと、神の世界に通じる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you pierce the heavenly wall, it leads to the realm of the gods...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな伝承もあったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was such a legend, wasn't there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……出たわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Here it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目測だけど、高度は7000から10000メートル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By estimation, its altitude is between 7,000 and 10,000 meters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……イラーピュより、遙かに高いわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...much higher than Illarpy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「翔竜山は確か、12000メートルやったっけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Shoryu is about 12,000 meters high, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足りとるな、一応……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That should be enough, at least...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーと、同じ高さまで登る、んですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, so we're going to climb up to the same height?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうすると……衛星は結局どうなるんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so... what will happen to the satellite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、衛星はそれ以上高く上がれないから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, the satellite can't rise any higher than that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス兄様についてきて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll follow Big Brother Rance and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の届く距離まで、来るかもしれません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might come within reach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ということだと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...that's what I think.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、決まりだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, it's decided!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山を登って、衛星を叩く！　以上！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll climb Mount Shoryu and smash that satellite! That's it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっし！　わかりやすい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright! That's easy to understand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また登るのはキツイけど、腹ぁくくったぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climbing again will be tough, but I'm prepared!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いくぞ！　高い所から見下ろしてやがる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go! That satellite looking down from above,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの衛星を叩き壊す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll smash it to pieces!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市を出て、一路、西方へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leaving the Free City, they headed straight west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸の中心に位置する翔竜山は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Shoryu, located in the center of the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切り立った剣のようにそびえ立つ、前人未踏の秘境である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is a sheer, towering peak like a drawn sword, an unexplored secret region.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Shoryu is about 12,000 meters high, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足りとるな、一応……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That should be enough, at least...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーと、同じ高さまで登る、んですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, so we're going to climb up to the same height?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうすると……衛星は結局どうなるんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so... what will happen to the satellite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、衛星はそれ以上高く上がれないから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, the satellite can't rise any higher than that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス兄様についてきて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll follow Big Brother Rance and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の届く距離まで、来るかもしれません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might come within reach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ということだと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...that's what I think.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、決まりだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, it's decided!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山を登って、衛星を叩く！　以上！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll climb Mount Shoryu and smash that satellite! That's it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっし！　わかりやすい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright! That's easy to understand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また登るのはキツイけど、腹ぁくくったぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climbing again will be tough, but I'm prepared!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いくぞ！　高い所から見下ろしてやがる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go! That satellite looking down from above,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの衛星を叩き壊す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll smash it to pieces!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市を出て、一路、西方へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leaving the Free City, they headed straight west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸の中心に位置する翔竜山は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Shoryu, located in the center of the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切り立った剣のようにそびえ立つ、前人未踏の秘境である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is a sheer, towering peak like a drawn sword, an unexplored secret region.
